quote: Hope is important because it can make the present moment less difficult to bear. If we believe that tomorrow will be better, we can bear a hardship today. – Thich Nhat Hanh
fact: In space, astronauts are unable to cry, because there is no gravity and the tears won`t flow.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Sometimes I tuck my knees into my chest and lean forward.  That’s just how I roll.
